properties.body:
EASTERN MEDITERRANEAN SEA.
SOUTHERN IONIAN SEA.
M/V PIRIREIS DISABLED AND ADRIFT DUE TO COLLISION
WITHIN FIVE MILES OF 36-10N 020-09E. TEN PERSONS
MISSING. VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP
A SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE. REPORTS
TO JRCC PIRAEUS, TELEX: 601211588, 601211254,
PHONE: 30 210 411 2500, 30 210 422 0772,
FAX: 30 210 413 2398, 30 210 411 5798.
